ability text: Dwarves are both tough and wise, but also a bit gruff.
extra language: Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, Terran, Undercommon

ability text: Elves are nimble, both in body and mind, but their form is frail.
weapon familiarity: longbow, composite longbow, longsowrd, rapier, shortbow, composite shortbow, elven
extra language: Celestial, Draconic, Gnoll, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, Sylvan

ability text: Gnomes are physically weak but surprisingly hardy, and their attitude makes them naturally agreeable.
extra language: Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Goblin, Orc

ability text: Half-elf characters gain a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.
extra language: Any non-secret

ability text: Half-orc characters gain a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.
extra language: Abyssal, Draconic, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin

ability text: Halflings are nimble and strong-willed, but their small stature makes them weaker than other races.
extra language: Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Goblin

ability text: Human characters gain a +2 racial bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.
extra language: Any non-secret

ability text: Aasimars are insightful, confident, and personable.
extra language: Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Sylvan

ability text: Catfolk are sociable and agile, but often lack common sense.
extra language: Elven, Gnoll, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Orc, Sylvan

ability text: Dhampirs are fast and seductive, but their racial bond to the undead impedes their mortal vigor.
extra language: Any non-secret

ability text: Drow are nimble and manipulative.
extra language: Abyssal, Aklo, Aquan, Common, Draconic, Drow Sign Language, Gnome, or Goblin

ability text: Fetchlings are quick and forceful, but often strange and easily distracted by errant thoughts.
extra language: Aklo, Aquan, Auran, Draconic, D'ziriak (understanding only, cannot speak), Ignan, Terran, any regional human tongue

ability text: Goblins are fast, but weak and unpleasant to be around.
extra language: Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Gnoll, Gnome, Halfling, Orc

ability text: Hobgoblins are fast and hardy.
extra language: Draconic, Dwarven, Infernal, Giant, Orc

ability text: Ifrits are passionate and quick, but impetuous and destructive.
extra language: Aquan, Auran, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Terran

ability text: Kobolds are fast but weak.
extra language: Common, Dwarven, Gnome, Undercommon

ability text: Orcs are brutal and savage.
extra language: Dwarven, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin, Undercommon

ability text: Oreads are strong, solid, stable, and stoic.
extra language: Aquan, Auran, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Ignan, Undercommon

ability text: Ratfolk are agile and clever, yet physically weak.
extra language: Aklo, Draconic, Dwarven, Gnoll, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Orc, Undercommon

ability text: Sylphs are quick and insightful, but slight and delicate.
extra language: Aquan, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Ignan, Terran

ability text: Tengus are fast and observant, but relatively fragile and delicate.
extra language: Any non-secret

ability text: Tieflings are quick in body and mind, but are inherently strange and unnerving.
extra language: Abyssal, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Infernal, Orc

ability text: Undines are both perceptive and agile, but tend to adapt rather than match force with force.
extra language: Auran, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Ignan, Terran

ability text: Changelings are frail, but are clever and comely.
start language: Common, the primary language of their host society
extra language: Aklo, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin, Orc

ability text: Duergar are hearty and observant, but also belligerent.
extra language: Aklo, Draconic, Giant, Goblin, Orc, Terran

ability text: Gillmen are vigorous and beautiful, but their domination by the aboleths has made them weak-willed.
extra language: Aklo, Aquan, Draconic, Elven

ability text: Gripplis are nimble and alert, but spindly.
extra language: Boggard, Draconic, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Sylvan

ability text: Kitsune are agile and companionable, but tend to be physically weak.
extra language: any human language, Aklo, Celestial, Elven, Gnome, Tengu

ability text: Merfolk are graceful, hale, and beautiful.
extra language: Aboleth, Aklo, Draconic, Elven, Sylvan

ability text: Nagaji are strong and have forceful personalities, but tend to ignore logic and mock scholastic pursuits.
extra language: any human language, Abyssal, Aklo, Celestial, Draconic, Giant, Infernal, Sylvan

ability text: Samsarans are insightful and strong-minded, but their bodies tend to be frail.
extra language: any human language, Abyssal, Aquan, Auran, Celestial, Draconic, Giant, Ignan, Infernal, Nagaji, Tengu, Terran

ability text: Strix are swift and elusive, but tend to be stubborn and swift to anger.
extra language: Auran, Common, Draconic, Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Infernal

ability text: Sulis are brawny and charming, but slow-witted.
start language: Common, one elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran)
extra language: Aquan, Auran, Draconic, Ignan, Terran

ability text: Svirfneblin are fast and observant but relatively weak and emotionally distant.
extra language: Aklo, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Goblin, Orc, Terran

ability text: Vanaras are agile and insightful, but are also rather mischievous.
extra language: Aklo, Celestial, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Sylvan

ability text: Vishkanyas are graceful and elegant, but they are often irrational.
extra language: Aklo, Draconic, Elven, Goblin, Sylvan, Undercommon

ability text: Wayang are nimble and cagey, but their perception of the world is clouded by shadows.
extra language: any human language, Abyssal, Aklo, Draconic, Goblin, Infernal, Nagaji, Samsaran, Tengu
